description: This file defines a React component and context for managing tenant identification within a frontend application. It includes context creation, hooks, and UI components for setting and displaying the tenant ID, with persistent storage via localStorage.

methods.name: useTenant
methods.description: A React hook to access the current tenant context and setter.

methods.name: TenantProvider
methods.description: A React component that provides tenant state to its children, persisting the tenant ID in localStorage.

methods.name: TenantSelector
methods.description: A React component that provides a UI for selecting and displaying the current tenant ID.
